title: Senior Python Backend Engineer
description: Design scalable APIs in Python, collaborate with data science teams, and deploy services to AWS. Experience with Flask and asynchronous programming preferred.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Build ML pipelines, tune models, and ship production-ready features. Required: PyTorch, Python, feature engineering, and MLOps experience.

title: Full Stack Developer (React/Python)
description: Develop full stack web applications using React, Flask, and PostgreSQL. Collaborate with designers and product managers to ship features quickly.

title: Data Engineer
description: Own ETL workflows, manage data lakes, and optimize Spark jobs. Strong SQL and cloud infrastructure experience required.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Implement CI/CD pipelines, manage Kubernetes clusters, and improve developer tooling. Experience with Terraform and observability tooling is a plus.
